page.title: 10ADULT LEISURE
page.content: Leisure pursuits consist mainly of gardening,family outings or visits to pubs and clubs.Quite a large number of men in the area are keen gardeners and many enter local Leek Shows which are common in the north_east. Pubs and clubs are a favourite form of entertainment,especially at weekends when husband and wife often go out together for the evening.Live cabaret, dancing and bingo are provided by most clubs,while the pubs often offer pool as well as darts and dominoes.The most popular drink for women is lager while most men are beer drinkers.Prices vary,with the clubs being cheaper than the pubs. Many women and some men prefer the bingo halls of Jarrow and South Shields for their entertainment.People who enjoy the cinema have to travel to areas outside of South Tyneside.
